org.echo.mobile.framework.core.crypto.internal

Class CryptoCoreComponentImpl

  • org.echo.mobile.framework.core.crypto.internal.CryptoCoreComponentImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CryptoCoreComponent

    public class CryptoCoreComponentImpl
implements CryptoCoreComponent

    Implementation of interface CryptoCoreComponent

    Provides default implementation of cryptography core component based on bitcoinj ECKey realization

    See Also:
    interface CryptoCoreComponent

      • encryptMessage

        public byte[] encryptMessage(byte[] privateKey,
                             byte[] publicKey,
                             java.math.BigInteger nonce,
                             java.lang.String message)

        Encrypts string message using input keys

        Parameters:
        privateKey - Private key of one of the transfer operation parties
        publicKey - Public key of another participant of transfer
        nonce - Random entropy of memo payload for deriving unique key for every transfer
        message - Message for encrypting

      • decryptMessage

        public java.lang.String decryptMessage(byte[] privateKey,
                                       byte[] publicKey,
                                       java.math.BigInteger nonce,
                                       byte[] message)

        Decrypts string message using input keys

        Parameters:
        privateKey - Private key of one of the transfer operation parties
        publicKey - Public key of another participant of transfer
        nonce - Random entropy of memo payload for deriving unique key for every transfer
        message - Message for decrypting

      • encodeToWif

        public java.lang.String encodeToWif(byte[] source)
